text: Driftin' Sands is a 1928 American silent Western film directed by Wallace Fox and starring Bob Steele, Nina Quartero, and William H. Turner. == Cast == * Bob Steele as 'Driftin' Sands * Nina Quartero as Nita Aliso * William H. Turner as Don Roberto Aliso * Gladden James as Benton * Jay Morley * Carl Axzelle == References == == External links == * Category:1928 films Category:1928 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Wallace Fox Category:Film Booking Offices of America films
title: Driftin' Sands
